parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the color of the item (right) with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]] to color.
<br>
Colour is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetColorRight'''  [idc, index, color]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, color]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetColorRight''' [index, color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, color]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetColorRight]] [101, 0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetColorRight]] [0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
